section.heading: Limitation on recovery for protective services and benefits

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.34 > Section 74.34.025 74.34.020 << 74.34.025 >> 74.34.035 PDF RCW 74.34.025 Limitation on recovery for protective services and benefits. The cost of benefits and services provided to a vulnerable adult under this chapter with state funds only does not constitute an obligation or lien and is not recoverable from the recipient of the services or from the recipient's estate, whether by lien, adjustment, or any other means of recovery. [ 1999 c 176 s 4 ; 1997 c 392 s 304 .] NOTES: Findings — Purpose — Severability — Conflict with federal requirements — 1999 c 176: See notes following RCW 74.34.005 . Short title — Findings — Construction — Conflict with federal requirements — Part headings and captions not law — 1997 c 392: See notes following RCW 74.39A.009 .
